data.text:
Loved this hotel, everyone was so friendly.  Room was spacious with an amazing view of the Red Sea, the gardens and pool were immaculate.  Food was good, and we were even sent an anniversary cake to our room to celebrate.

So good we are coming back and taking our 2 adult Daughters with us in Aug/Sept so see you then can't wait.
data.title: Amazing week, going back for 2 weeks

data.text:
This review is a mixed bag. Firstly, the positives‚Ä¶.

The staff at the restaurant, reception and Sky Bar are wonderful and can‚Äôt do enough for you. A special mention to Roukia in the restaurant and Mohamed in the Sky Bar, as they should be praised for their level of customer service. 
The grounds are  very pretty & beautifully maintained and it was very easy to find sun beds near the beach. It‚Äôs not a beach by the way, you can really only  access the water from  the piers

The room was adequate and clean

Now the negatives‚Ä¶‚Ä¶

Our biggest complaint was the quality of the food. 
Breakfast was acceptable but lunch and dinner was just awful!! .There was absolutely no ‚Äúwow factor‚Äù and whilst the cold food (salads /desserts) were ok, it was the ‚Äúhot‚Äùfood‚Äù  that was definitely 1* at best!! It was lukewarm to cold most days, watery and lacking in flavour of any kind.  The soup, some nights  resembled watery stock. If you went to eat an hour into service, many dishes had gone and weren‚Äôt replaced.

This hotel is badly let down by its food so if you are expecting 4* or 5* food, don‚Äôt go here.
data.title: Nice grounds but don't  go for the food!

user_location.name: Swansea, Swansea County, South Wales, Wales

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Jane,
Thank you for choosing Grand Rotana Resort & Spa as a destination for your summer holiday in Sharm-el-Sheikh. I was delighted to receive your comments regarding the service and hospitality provided by our team members. I would like to thank you for taking the time to write to us. It is only through your valuable comments that we can continue to improve our products and services for you our valued guests. I noted your comment regarding food, rest assured that it will be passed to the concerned department's head. We will be happy to welcome you back in near future. Sincerely, Azmi Sami, General Manager.
owner_response.author: Mohamed Abdel Aal

data.text:
The resort was absolutely stunning, with its gorgeous views and charming atmosphere making our stay even more delightful. The resort and its crew left an amazing impression on us, showing top-notch service at every turn. It is with great pleasure that I wholeheartedly recommend this establishment to others.

I would love to recommend the photographer Amgad. His office is located near the reception area. Amgad was honestly such an amazing photographer and we are so satisfied with the pictures he took. He also had the kindest heart, and made us so comfortable when taking the photos. 

I also wish to extend my gratitude to Shrook, a delightful member of the restaurant staff. Her warm hospitality and infectious smile added to the enjoyment of our dining experience. We extend our best wishes to her for continued success.

Special mention must be made of Omar, who diligently prepared our suhoor meals during the Ramadan period. His attentive care and genuine kindness ensured that our needs were met with utmost consideration.

We are really impressed with the activities team too. They kept us entertained with all sorts of fun stuff throughout our stay. Their energy and creativity really added to the whole experience.

And last but definitely not least, Mohamed, our room cleaner. Our rooms were spotless, thanks to him. Plus, he'd make these cute towel animals and bring us flowers. 

Seriously, if you're looking for an amazing resort experience, this place and these people are the real deal.
data.title: Amazing experience üòäü´∂üèº

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Yasmina,
Thank you very much for such a wonderful review of your stay at Grand Rotana Resort & Spa. I am extremely glad to learn that you enjoyed your room location, service and the food in our a-la-carte restaurants. Our hotel indeed can be proud of a wonderful landscapes and greens. Thank you for your loyalty and I do hope that I will have the personal pleasure to welcome you back for another memorable stay. Kind regards, Azmi Sami, General Manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Abdel Aal

data.text: The hotel is perfect. The food is delicious and each day are new dishes. All staff are welcome to guests, help and do their best. The animation program is interesting and funny. All animators are friendly and ready to have fun with guests. Every night we went to the club.
data.title: Amazing vacation

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Valeria!
  Thank you for your wonderful comments about Grand Rotana Resort & SPA - Sharm El Sheikh. We are, of course, glad to hear that you really enjoy your holiday and like the service provided at our hotel. I was pleased to receive your comments regarding the hospitality provided by our team members. Thank you very much for your dedication to our hotel and we are happy to welcome you again and again! Please don't hesitate to contact us if you need any assistance,
With respect and best wishes, Azmi Sami, General Manager

data.text:
The Truth 
If you are an English couple please be advised we are definitely not catered for I have no idea why British airways has this hotel on their listings cause I would not recommend it. The hotel grounds are beautiful, the staff are lovely but that‚Äôs it. Food was terrible especially in their so called A La Carte restaurants, drinks are watered down I actually lost weight in 9 days. The sun loungers around the pool are awful nobody really uses them uncomfortable and old. 
I could continue with the grips but I think you get the idea.
data.title: The Truth

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest, 
Thank you very much for choosing to stay at Grand Rotana Resort & Spa and for taking the time to write to us. We greatly appreciate any comments made by our guests and constantly strive to achieve the highest quality standards. Please be assured that I have passed your feedback to the concerned department as we view all comments in an extremely constructive manner.
I look forward to welcoming you once more to Grand Rotana Resort & Spa or any of our Rotana Family of Hotels in the near future. 
Best regards, 
Azmi Sami, general manager
owner_response.author: Mohamed Abdel Aal
